oai_dc:dc.dc:title: I.W. Gernert Homes Under Construction, c.1964
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the I.W. Gernert Homes (Project Tenn. 5-14) under construction, circa 1964. The Gernert Homes were completed in 1965, and were the city's first low-rent housing project for the elderly. Located at 12th Avenue South and Edgehill Avenue, the high-rise building contained 90 efficiency apartments and 18 one-bedroom apartments. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
